title: Did the 1938 radio broadcast of World War cause national panic?
subtitle: The calculations conflict about how Americans were really terrified by the famous Orson Wells of 1938 "War of Worlds" Halloween.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Orson Wells, October 30, 1938, adapted radio from "World War" caused mass hysteria, convincing thousands of paranoid listeners across North America that the Earth was under attack by Mars.
